sourcesContent:
// Add themes as per your requirement
export const dark = {
  body: "#202020", // black shade
  text: "#fff",
  bodyRgba: "32,32,32",
  textRgba: "255,255,255",

  grey: "#bebebe",

  fontxs: "0.75em", // 1em = 16px
  fontsm: "0.875",
  fontmd: "1em",
  fontlg: "1.25em",
  fontxl: "2em",
  fontxxl: "3em",
  fontxxxl: "5em",
  fontBig: "10em",

  navHeight: "5rem",
};
